name: Slash and Dash: Bolo's Edit
description: This is a revision of a game that Colton Pfannenstiel , Jack Hale,  and I created for the ICT game jam 2019 (I did the art).  I made some  minor changes such as custom death animations for some enemies, a blood particle system, more feedback when dashing into an enemy, and so on. A more vanilla version was also uploaded under Jack's account during the actual game  jam.
